Title: US authorises Ebola drug for coronavirus treatment
Summary: [u"The US's Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has authorised the emergency use of the Ebola drug remdesivir for treating the coronavirus.", u'But emergency FDA authorisation is not the same as formal approval, which requires a higher level of review.', u'The authorisation means the anti-viral drug can now be used on people who are hospitalised with severe Covid-19.', u'President Trump has been a vocal supporter of remdesivir as a potential treatment for the coronavirus.', u'A recent clinical trial showed the drug helped shorten the recovery time for people who were seriously ill.']

Title: Will New York ever be New York again?
Summary: [u"On another it was Frank Sinatra's rousing Big Apple anthem, New York, New York.", u'To a city known for its bravado and life abundant, the coronavirus brought an overriding sense of fear.', u"There was something inevitable about the world's most global city becoming the epicentre of a worldwide contagion.", u"\n\nBut that's the unanswerable question - when will New York return to being New York.", u'But while parts of the Empire State will be able to start the gradual process of reopening in mid-May, the urban density of New York City means it will have to go at an uncharacteristically slower pace.']

Title: What's behind Trump's new strategy on China?
Summary: [u"There's certainly been a dramatic uptick in negative views of China since Mr Trump took office and dialled up the trade war.", u'As the election approaches Mr Trump has signalled that he will listen more to the hawks than the doves in his coterie of conflicted advisors.', u'Enter China, the origin of the pandemic and accused of acting too slowly to stop its global spread.', u'The Republican strategy actually attacks the former vice president, Joe Biden, the presumed Democratic nominee.', u'"There\'s a zero sum ideological and geopolitical spin on the ball coming out of China that predates Donald Trump."']

Title: 'I will never lie to you'
Summary: [u'Kayleigh McEnany is the fourth person to hold the role since President Donald Trump took office in 2017.', u'Her predecessors, who include Sean Spicer and Sarah Huckabee Sanders, had been accused of deliberately misleading the press.', u'\n\nMcEnany assured reporters that she would never lie to them, adding that she planned on holding more press briefings in the future.']

Title: World health body 'did not waste time'
Summary: [u'The World Health Organization says it "didn\'t waste time" responding to the coronavirus after facing criticism for its handling of the outbreak.', u'On Thursday President Trump appeared to undercut his own intelligence agencies by suggesting he had seen evidence coronavirus originated in a Chinese laboratory.', u"The US is the global health body's largest single funder and President Trump says he will halt funding.", u'Speaking at a news conference on Friday Dr Tedros offered a vigorous defence of how the organisation responded.', u'Dr Tedros was also asked again about relations with the United States, insisting the UN agency remained in "constant contact" with the country.']

Title: Elon Musk tweet wipes $14bn off Tesla's value
Summary: [u"Tesla's founder Elon Musk wiped $14bn off the carmaker's value after tweeting that its share price was too high.", u'"Tesla stock price too high imo," he said, one of several tweets that included a vow to sell his possessions.', u'Mr Musk said the promise to sell his possessions included his house, formerly owned by actor and producer Gene Wilder, and bought in 2013.', u'"We view these Musk comments as tongue in cheek and it\'s Elon being Elon.', u'But last month, a federal judge said Tesla and Musk must face a lawsuit by shareholders over the going-private tweet, including a claim that Mr Musk intended to defraud them.']

Title: Charlotte takes food to needy as she turns five
Summary: [u'She has helped her family take food to the elderly and vulnerable in Norfolk.', u"New photos have been released to mark Princess Charlotte's fifth birthday, showing her delivering homemade care packages to those in need during the coronavirus crisis.", u'The four photos were taken in April by her mother, the Duchess of Cambridge, a keen amateur photographer.', u'In two photos, the princess is seen picking up white bags of food for pensioners who are shielding from the virus or other vulnerable people in lockdown in Norfolk.', u"Charlotte was born at the private maternity Lindo Wing of St Mary's Hospital in Paddington, central London, at 08:34 BST on 2 May 2015, weighing 8lb 3oz."]

Title: Biden denies sexually assaulting staff assistant
Summary: [u'US Democratic candidate Joe Biden has flatly denied sexually assaulting a former staff assistant, Tara Reade, nearly 30 years ago.', u'He asked for a search of the Senate archives for any record of a complaint Ms Reade allegedly filed at the time.', u'He is having trouble answering questions now over why it should not be the case with Ms Reade.', u'She said she was a victim of sexual assault without naming Mr Biden.', u'Mr Biden is running against Republican President Donald Trump, who has been accused of sexual misconduct by some 25 women.']

Title: Social-distancing at airports is 'impossible'
Summary: [u'Introducing social distancing at airports is "physically impossible", the boss of Heathrow has warned.', u'\n\n"Enforcing social-distancing is essential if our members and airport passengers are to feel that their lives are more important than money," he said.', u'The GMB has called for urgent action to protect Heathrow airport workers after an over-crowding incident this week.', u'However, the GMB union said the airport must enforce social-distancing to protect staff and passengers.', u"But the chief executive of Europe's busiest airport said airports will have to introduce health-screening and passengers will have to wear masks."]
